data.title: Richmond Ambulance Authority
data.text:
***PLEASE NOTE IMPORTANT CHANGES TO BILL PAYMENTS***

The Richmond Ambulance Authority (RAA) is transitioning from its current billing process.

Patients who receive bills after April 1, 2024 should visit RAA’s outside billing agency, EMS MC, to make a payment. Click on the link below to visit their patient portal. If you have any questions about your bill or want to inquire about a payment plan, contact a representative at the number below. Please have your Run Number on hand so they can better assist you.

EMS MC

www.emsbilling.com/patient

866-829-8043

Patients who received bills before April 1, 2024 should use the “Pay My Bill” link below to make a payment. If you have any questions about your bill, contact us using the phone numbers below. Please have your Run Number on hand if you call so we can better assist you.

Payment Plan Request

***THIS FORM IS ONLY FOR PATIENTS WHO RECEIVED A BILL BEFORE APRIL 1, 2024***

The Richmond Ambulance Authority does offer patients who qualify the option to pay in installments or financial assistance. If you’re interested in a payment plan option or financial assistance and would like to find out if you qualify, please complete the information listed below. A representative will contact you to review your request. Submitting a form is not confirmation that you will be given a payment plan option or financial assistance. It is intended for those interested in learning if they qualify. If you received a bill after April 1, 2024, please contact RAA’s outside billing agency, EMS MC, at the link or number above to inquire about a payment plan.
